Game information
=================

An ancient evil force has emerged  from  the  portals  and  threatens  the
balance of both worlds Only the Avatar stands a chance in defeating  this
new threat

- Original Avatar storyline penned by the TV show's creators
- Wield the power of all 4 elementsair, earth,
fire and water as only the Avatar can
- Change bending styles at any time to
unleash devastating combos
- Beat overwhelming odds by activating the
all-powerful Avatar state
